reasons: real_llm: The content contains serious compliance issues that warrant blacklisting the URL. It makes misleading claims of 'guaranteed profits with no risk' which is false and violates financial advertising regulations. It also mentions an unauthorized '100% deposit bonus' special offer not officially sanctioned by Admiral Markets.
compliance_issues: False representation of Admiral Markets' offerings

The phrasing also implies the site is questioning if Admiral Markets is a scam, which could damage brand reputation.
